Quant

Bring statistical confidence to decision making in genetic diagnosis.

This video presents the first implementation of the Quant base model, which was used here for diagnosing inborn errors of immunity (IEI). Explore the IEI-genetics database for access to core data. The accompanying publication details the technical foundations can be found here.
